General.Name: Jacques Bogart SA
General.Description: Jacques Bogart S.A. produces and sells fragrances and cosmetics in Paris and internationally. It markets its fragrance products under the JACQUES BOGART, CARVEN, CHEVIGNON, and TED LAPIDUS brand names; cosmetic products under the STENDHAL, METHODE JEANNE PIAUBERT, and APRIL brand names; and fashion products under the TED LAPIDUS FASHION brand name. The company was founded in 1975 and is based in Paris, France.

1.Name: Ms. Régine  Konckier
1.Title: Deputy CEO of Customer & Supplier PR and Director
